product.bullet_points:
• TWICE AS FUN, TWICE AS NICE: This cotton jersey quilt is twice fun as it is nice. Reversible from a quilt with cotton fabric on one side and cotton jersey on the other side - as soft, breathable and stretchy Simple yet elegant, this versatile jersey quilt is a bedroom essential that works nicely with any bedding collections. Ideal for year-round use as it remains cool in the summer and warm in the winter.
• COMFY COTTON JERSEY T-SHIRT: Our soft cotton jersey quilted coverlet has the relaxed, comfy style of your favorite tee. It feels like putting on an extra cuddly tee or sweatshirt when you go under this quilt. Lightweight, comfortable and elastic, cotton jersey is highly durable in construction. This timeless quilted texture offers ultra breathability and keeps you stylishly warm each night.
• SIZES & MEASUREMENTS: This 3 piece quilt set includes one quilt coverlet and two pillow shams. Full/queen size: one quilt 90(W) x 90(L) inches, two pillow shams 20 x 26 inches each. King size: one quilt 104(W) x 90(L) inches, two pillow shams 20 x 36 inches each.
• EASY CARE: whole Quilt Machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle. Wash dark colors separately. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed, Iron on low heat if needed. Due to the natural properties of cotton, we recommend WASHING THE QUILT SET BEFORE USE FOR BEST RESULTS - softer and more fluffy!
• MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We takes pride in our long standing commitment to best quality materials and well-made bedding. If you are not completely satisfied with any item you purchased, contact us at any time
